keyword: how many calories are in mandarins
title: How Many Calories Are in Mandarins?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in mandarins per fruit, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Mandarins?
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh mandarin (about 84 g), raw, peeled and segmented, no added sugar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and preparation; canned or processed versions differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium mandarin has about 45 kcal and is a good source of vitamin C.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one mandarin?
faqs.a: About 45 kcal for one medium fresh mandarin.
Yes, one mandarin has ~10.9 g carbs, mostly natural sugars.
Around 1.7 g dietary fiber per medium mandarin.

faqs.q: Do mandarins have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (0.3 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per fruit.

faqs.q: Calories in canned vs fresh mandarins?
faqs.a: Canned in syrup adds ~10-20 kcal per fruit; fresh is lower.
